Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue blocks or unstained FFPE slides
Purpose: To immunostain tissue with BCL-2 antibody for diagnostic evaluation of lymphomas and other malignancies.
Container: FFPE tissue block or adhesive glass microscope slide
Equipment: Microtome, slide heating/deparaffinization setup, automated or manual immunostainer, microscope
